definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
the state of moisture in the soil (and whether it can support a crop)

sentences.english: Effects of plastic film mulching and pre-sowing irrigation on yield formation of spring wheat.
sentences.chinese: 地膜覆蓋和底墒灌溉對春小麥產量形成的影響。

sentences.english: There was a half-hidden door in the ivied wall.
sentences.chinese: 在爬滿常春藤的墒上有一扇半掩的門。

sentences.english: So full of water, improving the work of the moisture in the soil and soil moisture before sowing.
sentences.chinese: 因此要充分挖掘水源，做好播種前的造墒和保墒工作。

sentences.english: What are you doing? —I am looking for my ruler.
sentences.chinese: 椖閽詬墒裁矗織我正在找尺子。

sentences.english: Wheat is easily influenced by environment factors for two periods mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 播種前底墒對小麥產量的影響極爲重要。

definition: new shoot growing from cut branch or stump
small plot of farm land/Taiwan pr. [xi1]
